Package model

Class Level

java.lang.Object
model.Level
public class Level extends Object
This is Level class to define different levels in this game.

  • Constructor Details

    • Level

      public Level(Rectangle drawArea, int brickCount, int lineCount, double brickDimensionRatio, Wall wall)
      This is a constructor to initialise some variables in Level class.
      Parameters:
      drawArea - draw area to draw all the bricks
      brickCount - number of bricks
      lineCount - row of bricks to be drawn
      brickDimensionRatio - width of brick : height of brick ratio
      wall - Wall object

  • Method Details

    • makeSingleTypeLevel

      private Brick[] makeSingleTypeLevel(Rectangle drawArea, int brickCnt, int lineCnt, double brickSizeRatio, int type)
      This method is to make a level which consists of only 1 type of brick.
      Parameters:
      drawArea - draw area to draw the bricks
      brickCnt - number of bricks
      lineCnt - row of bricks to be drawn
      brickSizeRatio - width of brick : height of brick ratio
      type - type of brick
      Returns:
      a level which consists of the drawn bricks

    • makeChessboardLevel

      private Brick[] makeChessboardLevel(Rectangle drawArea, int brickCnt, int lineCnt, double brickSizeRatio, int typeA, int typeB)
      This method is to make a level which consists of 2 types of brick.
      Parameters:
      drawArea - draw area to draw the bricks
      brickCnt - number of bricks
      lineCnt - row of bricks to be drawn
      brickSizeRatio - width of brick : height of brick ratio
      typeA - first type of brick
      typeB - second type of brick
      Returns:
      a level which consists of the drawn bricks

    • makeLevels

      private Brick[][] makeLevels(Rectangle drawArea, int brickCount, int lineCount, double brickDimensionRatio)
      This method is to make levels (either single type or chessboard type).
      Parameters:
      drawArea - draw area to draw the bricks
      brickCount - number of bricks
      lineCount - row of bricks to be drawn
      brickDimensionRatio - width of brick : height of brick ratio
      Returns:
      levels which consist of the drawn bricks

    • nextLevel

      public void nextLevel()
      This method draws bricks and set brick count if there is next level.

    • hasLevel

      public boolean hasLevel()
      This method checks if there is another level in this game.
      Returns:
      whether there is another level

    • makeBrick

      private Brick makeBrick(Point point, Dimension size, int type)
      This method makes bricks of different types.
      Parameters:
      point - point (x-coordinate and y-coordinate) to start drawing the brick
      size - size (width and height) of brick
      type - type of brick to be made
      Returns:
      brick that has been made
